Name: Prison Wars
About the game: Prison Wars is an old-school browser based PvP MMORPG. A loved and well established classic, with the original version still running and having a dedicated active community! This is a remake of that same beloved game, by the same people who created the original! Features We've remade the entire UI from scratch, to include long requested changes and updates. Added 16:9 support and improved textures. Recalibrated balancing. Remade and introduced new game features. While we've left all the features you know and love Prison Wars for: PvP - Fight all other inmates to see who comes on top! Gangs - Create or join a prison guild with other players. Gang Activities - Co-op with your gang mates and take on jobs together. Gang Wars - Take over prison territories in epic gang wars! Prison Control - Take over enough territories and the guards, and rule them all! Character development - Increase stats the way you want to. Skills - Decide what illicit trades you want to focus on. Global and Local chat functionality - communication is key.
